title: Application Fee Waiver  · Angelo State University
description: Request an application fee waiver at Angelo State to simplify your admissions process and reduce costs for eligible students applying to the university.

headings: Qualify for free and/or reduced lunches
Ward of the state or in foster care
Adopted from/placed in foster care under the Texas Department of Family and Protective Services
Family Income meets the economic index for reduced price meals
Returning Student Active Duty Military Application Fee Waiver
paragraphs: The Office of Admissions has an undergraduate application fee waiver program available to individuals who qualify under one of the following conditions. The waiver covers the cost of applying for admission to ASU’s undergraduate programs.
Students must complete ASU’sApplication Fee Waiver Requestand provide supporting documentation if they meetoneof the following qualifications:
Letter from the applicant’s current school district indicating he/she qualifies for free and/or reduced lunches (freshman applicants only).
Required Documentation:Letter from a caseworker that identifies the applicant as a ward of the state or resident in foster care.
Required Documentation:Letter from a high school homeless liaison or current homeless shelter indicating that the student is homeless or an unaccompanied youth.
Required Documentation:Copy of your state college tuition and fee waiver from the Texas Department of Family and Protective Services.
Required Documentation:Copy of SAT or ACT College Application Fee Waiver with signature.
Required Documentation:Copy of most recent income tax forms that show the applicant’s total family income (before taxes) at or below the economic index in the table below.
If you did not file an income tax return for the year 2022, you must submit a Verification on Non Filing Form from the IRS. You can obtain this form by first submitting IRS Form 4506-T to the IRS.

Students may also qualify for a fee waiver based on their Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA) atstudentaid.gov. Students who submit their FAFSA and meet the qualifications for a fee waiver will automatically have their application fee waived.

Military personnel who are former undergraduate ASU students and are on active duty are eligible to receive an application fee waiver. See theReturning Student Active Duty Military Application Fee Waiver Request Formfor more information.
Current full-time staff of ASU who are seeking an undergraduate degree are eligible to receive an application fee waiver. See theASU Staff Application Fee Waiver Request Formfor more information.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
